reviewText:
CUT VERSIONS.  I bought the UK blu-ray steel book set of 1 & 2 and just found out they are cut.  You need to buy the US blu-rays if you want uncut versions.  The films have aprox 3 minutes cut each.
 EDIT:  only the 2nd film is cut.  The first film runs at 25fps which resulted in a shorter run time.
